body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting SecureDrive. My name is Gerald Foster. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Gerald, my name is Madison Powell.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Madison. How may I assist you today? Could you please provide me with your date of birth and address for security verification?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my date of birth is five zero seven nine, and my address is two four three Pine Street, Anytown, USA.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Madison, for sharing that information. Could you also confirm the last four digits of your Social Security number and your mother's maiden name for additional verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, the last four digits of my Social Security number are eight two three six, and my mother's maiden name is Brown.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Madison, for verifying your details. I appreciate your cooperation. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling sad because of a recent incident at the car dealership. Can you help me resolve the security issue?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Madison. We will do our best to assist you with the security problem at the car dealership. Your safety is our priority. Thank you for reaching out to us.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Madison. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us again. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your help, Gerald. Have a great day too!
